Gang violence sparks in Haiti as prime minister visits KenyaA wave of panic swept through downtown Port-au-Prince on Thursday, with an outburst of violence marked by heavy gunfire and improvised barricades, and a gang leader took responsibility saying it was a demonstration against authorities. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 20:14:40 GMT 6FDT5SEXCBKHXIUGRK72EGRHVE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/gang-violence-sparks-haiti-prime-minister-visits-kenya-2024-02-29/Reuters世界美洲
Five countries pledge personnel for Haiti security mission, UN saysThe Bahamas, Bangladesh, Barbados, Benin and Chad have formally notified the United Nations of their intent to contribute personnel to an international force to help Haitian national police fight armed gangs, a U.N. spokesman said on Thursday. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 19:56:48 GMT DOGYTGCPVZOTTJS5CHVXAC5HKE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/ Five-countries-pledge-personnel-haiti-security-mission-un-says-2024-02-29/Michelle Nichols世界美洲
Ukraine's Zelenskiy appoints new military logistics chiefPresident Volodymyr Zelenskiy appointed Volodymyr Karpenko as new commander of Ukraine's Logistics Forces on Thursday, according to a presidential decree. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 19:36:32 GMT QURTCTRA35J3JAYRFLJNZEBHLY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-zelenskiy-appoints-new-military-logistics-chief-2024-02-29/Reuters世界欧洲
UN inquiry into UNRWA staff hopes to get material shortly from IsraelUnited Nations investigators expect to receive shortly materials from Israel related to its accusations that staff with the U.N. Palestinian refugee agency took part in the Oct. 7 attacks by Hamas militants, a U.N. spokesman said on Thursday. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 19:21:22 GMT 22XGZKS3N5N3XDNDEZTPKCMEDA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-inquiry-into-unrwa-staff-hopes-get-material-shortly-israel-2024-02-29/Michelle Nichols世界中东
US urgently seeking information on what took place in northern Gaza aid incidentThe U.S. is urgently seeking information on what took place in northern Gaza on Thursday, where health authorities said more than 100 Palestinians had been shot dead by Israeli forces as they waited for an aid delivery. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 19:19:58 GMT SMARUX4EAVMH3EPZXMBUEKILTU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-urgently-seeking-information-what-took-place-northern-gaza-aid-incident-2024-02-29/Simon Lewis世界中东
Pentagon walks back Austin's Gaza casualty figuresU.S. Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin told Congress on Thursday that more than 25,000 women and children had been killed by Israel in Gaza since October 7, but the Pentagon later clarified that estimate, saying the figure came from the Hamas-run Gaza health ministry, not U.S. intelligence. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 19:08:52 GMT CUHOFQWCN5I4DIS3VKDXKEIAJQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/pentagon-walks-back-austins-gaza-casualty-figures-2024-02-29/Reuters世界中东
Biden discusses 'tragic and alarming incident' in Gaza with Egypt, Qatar leadersU.S. President Joe Biden discussed the "tragic and alarming incident" in northern Gaza on Thursday with the leaders of Egypt and Qatar, as well as ways to secure the release of Hamas hostages and a six-week ceasefire, the White House said. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 18:41:21 GMT B6RVGH3QTNKWFPARGMJBVLAKYY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/biden-discusses-tragic-alarming-incident-gaza-with-egypt-qatar-leaders-2024-02-29/Reuters世界中东
Poland to launch military satellites in 2025, deputy defence minister saysPoland plans to launch a series of military observation satellites in 2025, a deputy defence minister said on Thursday. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 18:39:00 GMT 4AE2IN4DWBI4ZGMWPECMMWHYOE https://www.reuters.com/technology/poland-launch-military-satellites-2025-deputy-defence-minister-says-2024-02-29/Reuters技术
Russian-American woman detained for treason said Russia was 'safe' before trip thereA Russian-American detained in Russia on a treason charge carrying up to 20 years in prison told her boyfriend "it's safe there" before she travelled to see relatives in Yekaterinburg, the woman's former mother-in-law said. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 17:54:52 GMT 4QFLFXDA2JIGNKIBRGFU4X4M7U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-american-woman-detained-treason-said-Russia-was-safe-before-trip-there-2024-02-29/Lucy Papachristou世界欧洲
US judge blocks Texas law cracking down on illegal border crossingsA federal judge in Texas on Thursday blocked the Republican-led state's new law giving officials broad powers to arrest, prosecute and order the removal of people who illegally cross the U.S.-Mexico border. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 17:14:44 GMT J5A72Q2F7NMMVPBSVPGUQLHX7I https://www.reuters.com/legal/us-judge-blocks-texas-law-cracking-down-illegal-border-crossings-2024-02-29/Daniel Wiessner合法的政府
G20 finance leaders still at odds over language on Gaza, Ukraine - sourcesFinance leaders of the G20 major countries are still debating how to describe wars in Ukraine and Gaza in a joint communique, with Russia and mostly Western nations at loggerheads over the language, two G20 sources told Reuters on Thursday. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 17:11:06 GMT RFBL3WUULFNAJC7PMQQAQF3UX4 https://www.reuters.com/world/g20-finance-leaders-still-odds-over-language-gaza-ukraine-sources-2024-02-29/Marcela Ayres, Christian Kraemer世界
